description:
Garlic is the father of Garlic Jr. He challenged Kami`s predecessor for the throne of Guardian of the Earth. Rejected because of his evil intentions, he responded by summoning an army of demons to take the position by force. Kami`s predecessor banished Garlic into either the Dead Zone or a black orb.
He only appears in flashbacks, his time was around 300 years prior to the beginning of Dragon Ball Z.
name: Garlic
